title: Set merchant key
name: setSharedSecret
description: Validates the app for this session, thus enabling financial transactions

parameters.name: sharedSecret
parameters.notes: The shared secret is a key provided by Handpoint when you get your account that enables you to perform live operations with the card reader. However, if you're developing with a starter kit, the test shared secret is specified in the example

elements.name: Boolean
elements.description: true if the operation was successfully sent to device

example:
//Sets the shared secret using the test key
api.setSharedSecret("0102030405060708091011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132");

title: Set merchant key
name: setSharedSecret
description: Saves the shared secret for the card reader so operations will be accepted by it.

parameters.name: sharedSecret
parameters.notes: This is used if you want to send the operation to a specific device. Recommended if you are using multiple devices

elements.name: Boolean
elements.description: true if the operation was successfully sent to device
